title: Collaborative Research Task Design Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Research Methodology and Task Design Experience
context.additional_context: A learner group comprising professionals (medical/legal/technical) in an educational environment focusing on collaborative activities using digital devices.

learning_goals: Through a collaborative consulting process, learners can set task parameters appropriate to their proficiency level when designing research assignments.
Learners can apply an assignment design framework that reflects iterative research and inquiry-based writing processes.
Learners can integrate information literacy evaluation criteria—developed in collaboration with library specialists—into assignment design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
